item.title: Object oriented design patterns - Creational patterns (Part 1)
item.description: This is the first part in a series of 3 blog post summarizing the classic book “Design Patterns: Elements of Reusable Object-Oriented Software” by Gamma, Helm, Johnson and Vlissides, collectively known as the Gang of Four (GoF). The book is widely regarded as a seminal work in the field of software engineering and is frequently cited as one of the most influential books in the industry. The book focuses on the concept of software design patterns, which are reusable solutions to common programming problems.
